file_content.text: Republic troops dead? Good. Tell the Empire Thadd helped them.
Get beacons. Put them near guns. Republic troops die!
My lord. I can help the Empire. The Empire needs help, yes?
Please, Imperial friend. I can help the Empire. The Empire needs help, yes?
The Republic air-drops soldiers into Axial Park. The soldiers kill the Imperials. It is very bad.
But I have seen how we can trick the Republic soldiers so they drop, and the Empire shoots them. No more dead Imperials.
Why would you help the Empire?
Empire is winning, yes? Don't care who wins, just want war to be over.
This is none of your business.
But! But! Save lives! Win war!
Republic uses beacons for landing zones. Take beacons, put them near Imperial troops. Republic soldiers land, die. Clever plan. Sure to work.
It's actually not a bad plan.
Good. Best of luck. Kill the Republic. Tell the Empire I helped.
No. Not waste! Please change your mind.
I am Thadd. I help the Empire.
